languages.text: "Второе место — это лантерна Большого собора. Лантерна — это такая башенка на куполе. Видели главный Атриум станции? Весь он — неф бывшего Малого собора. Весь так называемый дворец Наместника умещается в то, что должно было быть всего одним залом. Большой собор, если б его построили, был бы еще огромнее. Но увы — его только начали возводить, когда Девейн умер, и работы встали. Лантерна с купола, однако, уже была готова и уцелела. Ее затащили внутрь Атриума, и теперь она зовется Часовней святого Друза-Воителя".

"The second location is the lantern of the Great Cathedral. A lantern is a small tower on top of a dome. You've seen Footfall's Atrium, haven't you? The whole Atrium is just the nave of the former Little Cathedral. The Liege's entire so-called palace would have fit inside what was meant to be naught but a single room. The Great Cathedral, had it been built, would have been even bigger. But, alas, its construction was just getting underway when Dewain died and the work stopped. The lantern from its dome, however, had already been built and survived. It was brought inside the Atrium and dubbed the Chapel of Saint Drusus the Warrior."

languages.text: 「ふたつ目の場所はグレート・カテドラルのランタンです。ランタンとはドームの上に立つ小さな塔のことです。フットフォールのアトリウムは既にご覧になっていますよね？アトリウム全体は、かつて存在していたリトル・カテドラルの本堂にすぎません。リージュのいわゆる宮廷全体が、ひとつの部屋として作られていた空間の中におさまっていたでしょう。グレード・カテドラルが建設されていれば、さらに大きかったはず。しかし、建設が始まったばかりの頃にドウェインが亡くなり、工事は中断してしまいました。代わりにドームのランタンはすでに建設され、生き残りました。アトリウムの中に持ち込まれ、戦士ドラサスの礼拝堂と呼ばれました」
languages.original_text: "The second location is the lantern of the Great Cathedral. A lantern is a small tower on top of a dome. You've seen Footfall's Atrium, haven't you? The whole Atrium is just the nave of the former Little Cathedral. The Liege's entire so-called palace would have fit inside what was meant to be naught but a single room. The Great Cathedral, had it been built, would have been even bigger. But, alas, its construction was just getting underway when Dewain died and the work stopped. The lantern from its dome, however, had already been built and survived. It was brought inside the Atrium and dubbed the Chapel of Saint Drusus the Warrior."

traits.locale_text: 「ふたつ目の場所はグレート・カテドラルのランタンです。ランタンとはドームの上に立つ小さな塔のことです。フットフォールのアトリウムは既にご覧になっていますよね？アトリウム全体は、かつて存在していたリトル・カテドラルの本堂にすぎません。リージュのいわゆる宮廷全体が、ひとつの部屋として作られていた空間の中におさまっていたでしょう。グレード・カテドラルが建設されていれば、さらに大きかったはず。しかし、建設が始まったばかりの頃にドウェインが亡くなり、工事は中断してしまいました。代わりにドームのランタンはすでに建設され、生き残りました。アトリウムの中に持ち込まれ、戦士ドラサスの礼拝堂と呼ばれました」

languages.text: “第二个位置是至高大教堂的灯塔，灯塔就是教堂圆顶上面的小塔。您去过落脚港的中庭吧？整个中庭就是以前小教堂的中央大厅。而那个所谓的总督宫殿，其实只不过是原本教堂之中的一个房间。如果那座至高大教堂建造完成的话，它的规模还会更大。但遗憾的是，德维恩去世时，教堂的建设才刚刚开始，之后施工就被迫中断了。不过，圆顶上的灯塔已经建好了，保存了下来。那座灯塔被摆在了中庭，被人们称为‘勇士德鲁苏斯教堂’。”
languages.original_text: "The second location is the lantern of the Great Cathedral. A lantern is a small tower on top of a dome. You've seen Footfall's Atrium, haven't you? The whole Atrium is just the nave of the former Little Cathedral. The Liege's entire so-called palace would have fit inside what was meant to be naught but a single room. The Great Cathedral, had it been built, would have been even bigger. But, alas, its construction was just getting underway when Dewain died and the work stopped. The lantern from its dome, however, had already been built and survived. It was brought inside the Atrium and dubbed the Chapel of Saint Drusus the Warrior."

traits.locale_text: “第二个位置是至高大教堂的灯塔，灯塔就是教堂圆顶上面的小塔。您去过落脚港的中庭吧？整个中庭就是以前小教堂的中央大厅。而那个所谓的总督宫殿，其实只不过是原本教堂之中的一个房间。如果那座至高大教堂建造完成的话，它的规模还会更大。但遗憾的是，德维恩去世时，教堂的建设才刚刚开始，之后施工就被迫中断了。不过，圆顶上的灯塔已经建好了，保存了下来。那座灯塔被摆在了中庭，被人们称为‘勇士德鲁苏斯教堂’。”

languages.text: «La siguiente ubicación es la linterna de la Gran Catedral. Una linterna es una torrecita en lo alto de una cúpula. El Atrio de Paso lo conoce, ¿verdad? Pues todo el Atrio no es más que la nave de la catedral anterior, más pequeña. Todo el supuesto palacio del Señor habría cabido dentro, puesto que estaba concebida como una única sala. La Gran Catedral, de haberse construido, habría sido aún más grande, pero, por desgracia, apenas habían comenzado las obras cuando Dewain murió y se detuvieron. La linterna de la cúpula, sin embargo, ya estaba terminada y logró sobrevivir. La metieron dentro del Atrio y la renombraron como la capilla de san Drusus el Guerrero».
languages.original_text: "The second location is the lantern of the Great Cathedral. A lantern is a small tower on top of a dome. You've seen Footfall's Atrium, haven't you? The whole Atrium is just the nave of the former Little Cathedral. The Liege's entire so-called palace would have fit inside what was meant to be naught but a single room. The Great Cathedral, had it been built, would have been even bigger. But, alas, its construction was just getting underway when Dewain died and the work stopped. The lantern from its dome, however, had already been built and survived. It was brought inside the Atrium and dubbed the Chapel of Saint Drusus the Warrior."

traits.locale_text: «La siguiente ubicación es la linterna de la Gran Catedral. Una linterna es una torrecita en lo alto de una cúpula. El Atrio de Paso lo conoce, ¿verdad? Pues todo el Atrio no es más que la nave de la catedral anterior, más pequeña. Todo el supuesto palacio del Señor habría cabido dentro, puesto que estaba concebida como una única sala. La Gran Catedral, de haberse construido, habría sido aún más grande, pero, por desgracia, apenas habían comenzado las obras cuando Dewain murió y se detuvieron. La linterna de la cúpula, sin embargo, ya estaba terminada y logró sobrevivir. La metieron dentro del Atrio y la renombraron como la capilla de san Drusus el Guerrero».

languages.text: « Le deuxième lieu est la lanterne de la Grande Cathédrale. Une lanterne, c'est une petite tour située au sommet d'un dôme. Vous avez déjà vu l'Atrium de Castel, j'imagine ? C'est la nef de l'ancienne Petite Cathédrale. Le "palais" du souverain aurait tenu tout entier à l'intérieur de ce qui était censé n'être qu'une seule pièce. Si la Grande Cathédrale avait vu le jour, elle aurait été encore plus gigantesque. Hélas, Dewain est mort juste au début des travaux et le chantier a été interrompu. Cependant, la lanterne du dôme avait déjà été construite et elle a survécu. On l'a placée dans l'Atrium et elle est devenue la "chapelle de Saint Drusus le Guerrier". »
languages.original_text: "The second location is the lantern of the Great Cathedral. A lantern is a small tower on top of a dome. You've seen Footfall's Atrium, haven't you? The whole Atrium is just the nave of the former Little Cathedral. The Liege's entire so-called palace would have fit inside what was meant to be naught but a single room. The Great Cathedral, had it been built, would have been even bigger. But, alas, its construction was just getting underway when Dewain died and the work stopped. The lantern from its dome, however, had already been built and survived. It was brought inside the Atrium and dubbed the Chapel of Saint Drusus the Warrior."

traits.locale_text: « Le deuxième lieu est la lanterne de la Grande Cathédrale. Une lanterne, c'est une petite tour située au sommet d'un dôme. Vous avez déjà vu l'Atrium de Castel, j'imagine ? C'est la nef de l'ancienne Petite Cathédrale. Le "palais" du souverain aurait tenu tout entier à l'intérieur de ce qui était censé n'être qu'une seule pièce. Si la Grande Cathédrale avait vu le jour, elle aurait été encore plus gigantesque. Hélas, Dewain est mort juste au début des travaux et le chantier a été interrompu. Cependant, la lanterne du dôme avait déjà été construite et elle a survécu. On l'a placée dans l'Atrium et elle est devenue la "chapelle de Saint Drusus le Guerrier". »

languages.text: "Der zweite Ort ist die Laterne der Großen Kathedrale. Eine Laterne ist in diesem Fall ein kleiner Turm auf einer Kuppel. Das Atrium von Footfall kennt Ihr doch, oder? Das ganze Atrium ist das Mittelschiff der früheren Kleinen Kathedrale. Der gesamte sogenannte Palast des Lehnsherren hätte in diesen einzigen gewaltigen Raum gepasst. Und die Große Kathedrale, wäre sie gebaut worden, wäre noch größer gewesen. Doch leider war der Bau gerade in der Anfangsphase, als Dewain starb und die Arbeiten eingestellt wurden. Die Laterne der Kuppel jedoch war bereits fertig und hat auch überlebt. Sie wurde ins Atrium gebracht und erhielt den Namen Kapelle des Hl. Drusus des Kriegers."
languages.original_text: "The second location is the lantern of the Great Cathedral. A lantern is a small tower on top of a dome. You've seen Footfall's Atrium, haven't you? The whole Atrium is just the nave of the former Little Cathedral. The Liege's entire so-called palace would have fit inside what was meant to be naught but a single room. The Great Cathedral, had it been built, would have been even bigger. But, alas, its construction was just getting underway when Dewain died and the work stopped. The lantern from its dome, however, had already been built and survived. It was brought inside the Atrium and dubbed the Chapel of Saint Drusus the Warrior."

traits.locale_text: "Der zweite Ort ist die Laterne der Großen Kathedrale. Eine Laterne ist in diesem Fall ein kleiner Turm auf einer Kuppel. Das Atrium von Footfall kennt Ihr doch, oder? Das ganze Atrium ist das Mittelschiff der früheren Kleinen Kathedrale. Der gesamte sogenannte Palast des Lehnsherren hätte in diesen einzigen gewaltigen Raum gepasst. Und die Große Kathedrale, wäre sie gebaut worden, wäre noch größer gewesen. Doch leider war der Bau gerade in der Anfangsphase, als Dewain starb und die Arbeiten eingestellt wurden. Die Laterne der Kuppel jedoch war bereits fertig und hat auch überlebt. Sie wurde ins Atrium gebracht und erhielt den Namen Kapelle des Hl. Drusus des Kriegers."

languages.text: "İkinci yer, Büyük Katedral'in feneri. Fener, bir kubbenin üzerindeki ufak bir kuledir. Binliman'daki Atriyum'u görmüştünüz, değil mi? Atriyum'un tamamı, eski Küçük Katedral'in nef kısmıdır. Emîr'in güya saray dediği yer, aslında sırf tek bir oda olarak tasarlanan bu nef kısmına sığacak kadar küçük. Büyük Katedral bir inşa edilebileydi bundan bile büyük olacaktı. Maalesef Dewain öldüğünde inşaat henüz yeni başlamıştı, sonra tüm işler durdu. Kubbenin feneriyse hâlihazırda inşa edilmişti, sağ salim de kaldı. Feneri Atriyum'un içine getirdiler ve adını Savaşçı Aziz Drusus Şapeli koydular."
languages.original_text: "The second location is the lantern of the Great Cathedral. A lantern is a small tower on top of a dome. You've seen Footfall's Atrium, haven't you? The whole Atrium is just the nave of the former Little Cathedral. The Liege's entire so-called palace would have fit inside what was meant to be naught but a single room. The Great Cathedral, had it been built, would have been even bigger. But, alas, its construction was just getting underway when Dewain died and the work stopped. The lantern from its dome, however, had already been built and survived. It was brought inside the Atrium and dubbed the Chapel of Saint Drusus the Warrior."

traits.locale_text: "İkinci yer, Büyük Katedral'in feneri. Fener, bir kubbenin üzerindeki ufak bir kuledir. Binliman'daki Atriyum'u görmüştünüz, değil mi? Atriyum'un tamamı, eski Küçük Katedral'in nef kısmıdır. Emîr'in güya saray dediği yer, aslında sırf tek bir oda olarak tasarlanan bu nef kısmına sığacak kadar küçük. Hele Büyük Katedral bir inşa edilebileydi, bundan bile büyük olacaktı. Eyvahlar olsun ki Dewain ölünce inşaat henüz yeni başlamıştı, tüm işler durdu. Kubbenin feneriyse halihazırda inşa edilmişti ve sağ salim kaldı. Feneri Atriyum'un içine getirdiler ve adını Savaşçı Aziz Drusus Şapeli koydular."
